n = 3000
nn = (n - 1) // 2
marked = [False] * (nn + 1)
marked[nn] = True
i = 1
while i <= nn:
    j = i
    while i + j + 2 * i * j <= nn:
        marked[i + j + 2 * i * j] = True
        j += 1
    i += 1
arr = []
for i in range(nn + 1):
    if marked[i] == False:
        arr.append(2 * i + 1)
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    su = sum(list(map(int, input().split())))
    st = 0
    ed = len(arr)
    while su >= arr[st]:
        mid = (st + ed) // 2
        if su >= arr[mid]:
            st = mid + 1
        else:
            ed = mid
    print(arr[st] - su)
